name: Hack-O'-Lantern
description:
Pumpkins are cute, right?  WRONG! Those round, orange gourds that kids love to make into spooky faces around Halloween that cause such joy can turn...evil. 

Hack your way through an ever-increasing difficulty level, slashing at those pumpkins! Between the witch, different types of pumpkin and even pumpkin bombs, this isn't going to be easy...

If you like Fruit Ninja, you're going to love Hack-O'-Lantern!

For support or suggestions, please email support@bitgamey.com

Note: The next update will feature extra features (and a smaller file size for Android users).
